name: reboot (itch) (TomboFry, sleepiest, Dox5, AsteriaOracles, Tortupolar, Snorizzle)
name_original: reboot (itch) (TomboFry, sleepiest, Dox5, AsteriaOracles, Tortupolar, Snorizzle)
description:
REBOOT:ERROR_DISPOSEOFIMMEDIATELY

“The robots have become too smart!” 

Our cute robo protagonist COO-BOT wakes up in Trashcity, a shell of the robot they were before the recall.

Will they be able to break away from their programming and find a new home?

In this hand-drawn point-and-click game, you can help COO-BOT hoodwink the humans and make some friends along the way! 

Made for #16 Mini Jame Gam! 

CREDITS:

Art: sleepiestdesigns / Tortupolar

Game Programming: Dox5 / TomboFry / ForeignSnorts

Writing: Nightly Oracles / sleepiestdesigns

Music: TomboFry

Director of All the Things: sleepiestdesigns
